original_title: Parce que j'étais peintre, l'art rescapé des camps nazis
overview: In 1945, when the Allies liberated the concentration camps, they discovered thousands of secretly created artworks. With unprecedented access to paintings, drawings, etchings and sculptures held in collections around the world, BECAUSE I WAS A PAINTER conducts a gripping and fascinating investigation into art that captures, reflects and inspires in difficult times.
title: Because I Was a Painter: Art That Survived the Nazi Camps
